title: AWS CloudFormation - 2 updated methods
content: ListStackInstances and DescribeStackInstance now return a new `StackInstanceStatus` object that contains `DetailedStatus` values: a disambiguation of the more generic `Status` value. ListStackInstances output can now be filtered on `DetailedStatus` using the new `Filters` parameter.
contentSnippet: ListStackInstances and DescribeStackInstance now return a new `StackInstanceStatus` object that contains `DetailedStatus` values: a disambiguation of the more generic `Status` value. ListStackInstances output can now be filtered on `DetailedStatus` using the new `Filters` parameter.

title: Amazon QuickSight - 4 updated methods
content: Added support for cross-region DataSource credentials copying.
contentSnippet: Added support for cross-region DataSource credentials copying.

title: Amazon SageMaker Service - 2 updated methods
content: The new 'ModelClientConfig' parameter being added for CreateTransformJob and DescribeTransformJob api actions enable customers to configure model invocation related parameters such as timeout and retry.
contentSnippet: The new 'ModelClientConfig' parameter being added for CreateTransformJob and DescribeTransformJob api actions enable customers to configure model invocation related parameters such as timeout and retry.
